"""
    Test the centering algorithm with Gaussian weighting
    """
ngau = 10
npix = 200
xi = np.arange(ngau, npix, npix // ngau, dtype=float)
xt = xi + np.round(np.random.normal(scale=1.0, size=xi.size), decimals=1)
img = np.zeros((1, npix), dtype=float)
x = np.arange(npix)
for c in xt:
    img[(0), :] += (erf((x - c + 0.5) / np.sqrt(2) / 2) - erf((x - c - 0.5) /
        np.sqrt(2) / 2)) / 2.0
xr, xe, bad = moment.moment1d(img, xi, 4.0, row=0, weighting='gaussian',
    order=1)
assert np.mean(np.absolute(xi - xt)) - np.mean(np.absolute(xr - xt)
    ) > 0, 'Recentering did not improve the mean difference'
assert np.std(xi - xt) - np.std(xr - xt
    ) > 0, 'Recentering did not improve the standard deviation in the difference'
